Plot: An accomplished headhunter risks everything to obtain a valuable painting owned by a former mercenary.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 8 wins & 11 nominations.
Title: Headhunters
Writer: Ulf Ryberg (screenplay), Lars Gudmestad (screenplay), Jo Nesbø (novel)
Actors: Aksel Hennie, Synnøve Macody Lund, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Eivind Sander
